property.name: com.greenplum.hamster.preinstall
property.description: whether Hamster has been pre-installed in YARN cluster nodes, value = {true, false}. If true, please set the following configuration {com.greenplum.hamster.home}, and the $HAMSTER_HOME will set to {com.greenplum.hamster.home} when launching AMs. If false, please set the following configuration {com.greenplum.hamster.tarball.path}, with which, the Hamster binaries tarball will be uploaded to staging area and set $HAMSTER_HOME to ./ for AM.

property.name: com.greenplum.hamster.home
property.description: the dir path of Hamster which has been pre-installed in *YARN NM*. Make sure to set it when {com.greenplum.hamster.preinstall} is set to *true*

property.name: com.greenplum.hamster.tarball.path
property.description: the local directory of hamster tarball, e.g., /Users/hadoop/hamster2/hamster2.tar.gz; make sure to set it when {com.greenplum.hamster.preinstall} is set to *false*.

property.name: com.greenplum.hamster.enabled.logkeys
property.description: which log file will be show to user after a job is finished, split by "," e.g. "stdout", "stdout,stderr", "stderr,syslog". If you leave it blank, we will use default strategy print log out.

property.name: com.greenplum.hamster.yarn.version
property.description: version of hadoop in the cluster; if not set, 2.0.3-alpha will be set as the default value.

property.name: com.greenplum.hamster.hdfs.dir
property.description: the default dir in HDFS for Hamster job to upload files.
